data.comment: The match has started.
Corner awarded to Atletico.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
Throw-in Huesca.
Ball goes out of play for a Huesca goal kick.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Huesca in the half of Atletico.
Huesca have been awarded a corner by Adrian Cordero Vega.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a Atletico throw-in in Huesca's half.
In the minute 7, Atletico to take a throw-in in Huesca territory.
Goal kick for Huesca at El Alcoraz.
In Huesca a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 10, Huesca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Atletico get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Huesca's half?
Ball safe as Huesca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 13, Huesca's Mikel Rico gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Atletico defender.
Corner awarded to Huesca.
Adrian Cordero Vega awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 16, Adrian Cordero Vega signals a throw-in for Atletico, close to Huesca's area.
Huesca have been awarded a corner by Adrian Cordero Vega.
Jaime Seoane (Huesca) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 19, Atletico have a goal kick.
Atletico awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Huesca at El Alcoraz.
In the minute 22, Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
Can Atletico capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Joao Felix for Atletico gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 25, It's a goal kick for the home team in Huesca.
Adrian Cordero Vega awards Atletico a goal kick.
Throw-in for Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
Atletico have a goal kick.
Adrian Cordero Vega awards Atletico a goal kick.
In the minute 36, Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Atletico in their own half.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Atletico.
Atletico advance rapidly upfield but Adrian Cordero Vega blows for offside.
In the minute 42, Throw-in Atletico.
Huesca have been awarded a corner by Adrian Cordero Vega.
Can Huesca capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atletico's half?
In the minute 45, Huesca's Mikel Rico misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Atletico goal kick.
Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Huesca.
The second-half is underway in Huesca.
In the minute 46, It's a goal kick for the away team in Huesca.
Diego Simeone (Atletico) is making a first substitution, with Angel Correa replacing Vitolo.
Free kick for Atletico in their own half.
Goal kick for Huesca at El Alcoraz.
In the minute 48, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Atletico are coming forward and Marcos Llorente gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Huesca at El Alcoraz.
In the minute 51, Atletico drive forward but Kieran Trippier is judged offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Atletico awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Atletico in the half of Huesca.
Free kick Huesca.
Huesca push upfield and Dimitrios Siovas gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Atletico defence.
In the minute 56, In Huesca Atletico attack through Thomas Partey. The finish is off target, however.
Huesca have a goal kick.
Huesca drives forward and David Ferreiro gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 59, Atletico's Luis Suarez gets in a shot on goal at El Alcoraz. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Atletico.
Corner awarded to Atletico.
In the minute 61, Atletico have been awarded a corner by Adrian Cordero Vega.
Yannick Carrasco is on a sub for Marcos Llorente for Atletico.
The away team replace Luis Suarez with Diego Costa.
In the minute 63, Can Huesca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico's half?
Huesca push forward at El Alcoraz and Jaime Seoane gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Atletico defence.
Huesca have been awarded a corner by Adrian Cordero Vega.
In the minute 65, Atletico are pushing forward but Saul Niguez's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Huesca.
Atletico's Joao Felix breaks free at El Alcoraz. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 66, Adrian Cordero Vega awards Huesca a goal kick.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a Atletico throw-in in Huesca's half.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 69, Ball goes out of play for a Huesca goal kick.
Javier Ontiveros is replacing Borja Garcia for the home team.
Huesca make their second substitution with Rafa Mir replacing Shinji Okazaki.
In the minute 71, Javier Ontiveros of Huesca gets in a strike, but is off target.
Atletico have a goal kick.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Huesca to check on Pedro Lopez, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 72, Gaston Silva (Huesca) has replaced the possibly injured Pedro Lopez.
In Huesca, Atletico push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
The away team replace Saul Niguez with Koke.
In the minute 75, Andres Fernandez is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Huesca's Andres Fernandez looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In Huesca a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Atletico.
Ball goes out of play for a Huesca goal kick.
Throw-in for Atletico in the half of Huesca.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Atletico at El Alcoraz.
Free kick for Atletico in the half of Huesca.
Javi Galan for Huesca has been booked by Adrian Cordero Vega and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 81, In Huesca, Thomas Partey of Atletico is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Atletico awarded a free kick in their own half.
Juan Carlos is replacing Mikel Rico for Huesca at El Alcoraz.
In the minute 83, The home team have replaced David Ferreiro with Sergio Gomez. This is the fifth substitution made today by Michel.
Corner awarded to Atletico.
Atletico to take a throw-in in Huesca territory.
In the minute 85, Goal kick for Huesca at El Alcoraz.
Adrian Cordero Vega awards Huesca a goal kick.
Joao Felix (Atletico) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 89, Atletico have been awarded a corner by Adrian Cordero Vega.
Atletico pushes forward through Joao Felix, whose finish on goal is saved.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a Atletico throw-in in Huesca's half.
Diego Costa gets his shot on target but fails to score for Atletico.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Huesca.
At El Alcoraz the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
